name: Vexatious Traveler
desc:
A malignant wandering spirit makes contact with a target creature, who must succeed on a
Constitution saving throw or suffer 2d6 poison damage. Roll 1d4 on a failed saving throw to
determine if the target is poisoned, blind, frightened, or paralyzed until the end of your next turn.
empower:
Damage increased to 3d6. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half
damage.
